НО СУКА ЧИТЕРЫ КАЖДУЮ ИГРУ, ДАЖЕ НА ПРАЙМЕ НЕВОЗМОЖНО ИГРАТЬ ЧУВАК ИДЁТ 40-7-5
И ИХ СУКА НЕ БАНИТ Я У МЕНЯ УЖЕ 2 АККА ОТЛЕТЕЛО!

I really love this special esport first person shooter game.
Its one of the most playable competitive fps game on esport scene.
This is the game, where u have to train for hundreds of hours, to become master.
In fact it is cultivating your behavior skills, and thats exactly what I am looking for from the first person shooters.

Go and try it yourself, its very good game :)
Si BlackEspañolito subió a lvl 10 en Faceit todo el mundo puede!
Really fun when you are not playing it
This game was alright when you needed to purchase it. Now because it's free, more and more cheaters are present which slightly ruins the experience however it is still a great game to try out.
Best FPS out there. No doubt.

CSGO por donde empezar este juego que me a dado horas y horas de diversion, el juego es muy divertido aunque al ser multijugador aveces se transforma en algo molesto y poco divertido, pero a pesar de eso yo con mas de 1000 horas me diverti y pude mejorar demasiado es simplemente divertido y los invitaria a probarlo. Recomiendo jugarlo con amigos porque la experiencia asi rs mas divertida
